long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension adds a "Try in PWD" button on any Docker Hub image page. By clicking this button the user is presented with defined stack files for the image. Then it is possible to just try any of the stacks with a single click on Play With Docker.
